transcript: you have a small business own let's say a guy who owns a dry cleaning store he starts marketing and he sees another guy who's marketing on the same platform as him and he's like H I'm splitting the pie in half it's me this other guy and then two other guys start marketing on the platform and now he's only got a qut of the pie he's very sad and so what most people think their Market is is one method one platform one medium when in reality you've got warm Outreach you got cold Outreach you got posting content you got running ads you've got that across Facebook YouTube Instagram Twitter LinkedIn Hulu Spotify radio TV ad newspapers like the list goes on they think that because somebody else is running an ad they somehow split the pie when they haven't even gotten a seat at the table yet
